item.title: EP 599 - To Defeat The Mushroom, You Must Become The Mushroom!
item.itunes:title: To Defeat The Mushroom, You Must Become The Mushroom!
item.description:
Today we make a big mess in our diapers, and then we inject tea into our veins and become a magic mushroom!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/DeadRabbitRadio/explore?asc=u&page=1&sortOrder=recent

 

Links:

 

EP 508 - Skin: The Ultimate Body Horror

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-508-skin-the-ultimate-body-horror

Police: Louisiana Man Tricked Women Into Changing Diapers

https://www.usnews.com/news/us/articles/2020-12-15/police-louisiana-man-tricked-women-into-changing-diapers

Man Who Posed As Special Needs Patient So Home Nurses Would Change His Diapers Sentenced For Perverse Deception

https://www.oxygen.com/crime-news/rutledge-deas-iv-sentenced-for-deceiving-home-nurses-in-changing-his-diapers

Man accused of tricking women into changing his diapers says he was addressing childhood sexual trauma

https://www.nola.com/news/courts/article_ab5e39ee-0fc8-11ea-8d6e-e30a77f43f73.html

Arizona man fakes Down syndrome, hires caregivers to bathe him and change diapers

https://www.ktnv.com/news/arizona-man-fakes-down-syndrome-hires-caregivers-to-bathe-him-and-change-diapers

Arizona Man Accused Of Faking Down Syndrome To Get Baths And Diaper Changes

https://www.oxygen.com/crime-time/paul-menchaca-arizona-man-accused-faking-down-syndrome-to-get-baths-diaper-changes

Man accused of duping caregivers into changing his diapers is a former teacher's aide

https://www.azfamily.com/man-accused-of-duping-caregivers-into-changing-his-diapers-is-a-former-teachers-aide/article_1c82b994-3c24-5f59-8af5-fd7e2649cb91.html

PD: New victim says Gilbert man faked Down syndrome to be bathed

https://www.abc15.com/news/crime/pd-new-victim-says-gilbert-man-faked-down-syndrome-to-be-bathed

Man almost dies after injecting ‘magic mushroom’ tea into his vein, causing fungi to grow in his blood: doctors

https://www.msn.com/en-us/health/medical/man-almost-dies-after-injecting-magic-mushroom-tea-into-his-vein-causing-fungi-to-grow-in-his-blood-doctors/ar-BB1cJaxZ?ocid=msedgntp

Man Injected Magic Mushrooms Into His Veins, And They Started To Grow In His Blood

https://www.iflscience.com/health-and-medicine/man-injected-magic-mushrooms-into-his-veins-and-they-started-to-grow-in-his-blood/

A “trip” to the ICU: intravenous injection of psilocybin

https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S266729602030015X#

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Dead Rabbit Archivist Some Weirdo On Twitter AKA Jack

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
